meanings.definition: The quality or state of being divisible.
meanings.sent1: Mathematics teaches us about the divisibilities of numbers.
meanings.sent3: The divisibilities of the cake made it easy to share with everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a divisibility that brought people together effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the divisibilities of fractions is crucial in solving math problems.

meanings.definition: The property of being able to be divided evenly by a specific number.
meanings.sent3: The divisibilities of the puzzle pieces made it fun to put together.
meanings.sent4: His leadership had a divisibility that made the team work harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The divisibilities of the clock's numbers made it easy to tell time.
